dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4063 IH: Federal Interventions and New Detections of Fentanyl Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Dingell (for herself and Mr. Bilirakis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act to reauthorize a pilot program for public health laboratories to detect fentanyl and other synthetic opioids.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Federal Interventions and New Detections of Fentanyl Act of 2023 or the FIND Fentanyl Act of 2023.

section.header: Pilot program for public health laboratories to detect fentanyl and other synthetic opioids
section.text: Section 7011(d) of the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act (42 U.S.C. 247dâ€“10(d)) is amended by striking fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting fiscal years 2024 through 2028.
